tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NN holiday) (NN season)) (ADVP (RB really)) (VP (VBZ sucks) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (S (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ single)) (: ...) (S (VP (VB have) (NP (DT no) (NN fear) (NN tho)) (, ,) (ADVP (RB soon)))) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (MD 'll) (VP (VB be) (NP (NNS Valentines) (NN Day))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (MD 'll) (ADVP (RB really)) (VP (VB feel) (PP (IN like) (NP (NN shit))))))))) (. .)))
